snippet: Dr. Ackerman’s experience as a clinical psychologist informed a weekly advice column for The Huffington Post.
abstract: Mona Ackerman, advice columnist for The Huffington Post, dies at age 66.
lead_paragraph: Dr. Ackerman’s experience as a clinical psychologist informed a weekly advice column for The Huffington Post.

headline.seo: Mona Ackerman, Psychologist Who Wrote Advice Column, Dies at 66
headline.main: Mona Ackerman, Advice Columnist, Dies at 66
